name: Jingjing Li 0001
content: Dr. Jingjing Li's Personal Website WELCOME TO MY HOMEPAGE Hi, I am Dr. Jingjing Li is currently a professor at University of Electronic Science and Technology of China (UESTC). His research interest includes Computer Vision, Machine Learning and Multimedia Analysis. Specifically, he focuses on Domain Adaptation, Zero-shot Learning and Recommender Systems. Office: Room B1-705, Main Building, UESTC Qingshuihe Campus. Email: jjl at uestc dot edu dot cn Homepage in Chinese: faculty.uestc.edu.cn/jjl Highlights Jingjing Li, Zhiqi Yu, Zhekai Du, Lei Zhu, and Heng Tao Shen.
